ygData.subject: Discrete Neural Networks
ygData.msgSnippet: What are the thoughts on a neural network that has inputs and outputs digitized?  Perhaps 8 bits or even less?  This would reduce the search space, but

ized?  Perhaps 8 bits or even less?  This would reduce the search space, bu=
t encourage larger structures.
